title: How to Check a PlayStation Plus Expiration Date

steps.headline: Turn on your PlayStation and connect to the internet.
steps.description: If your PlayStation is not already online, you'll need to connect to the internet now. You should see a network name that you're connected to when you navigate to your Settings > Network.

steps.headline: Press ↑ on the controller.
steps.description: Make sure you're on the Home screen of your PlayStation so you'll access the function area.

steps.headline: Select the golden cross icon that looks like controller buttons PlayStation Plus.
steps.description: You'll see this at the left of the menu.

steps.headline: Select Manage Membership.
steps.description: You'll see this in the top right corner of your screen and a menu will drop-down.

steps.headline: Select Subscription.
steps.description: This is usually the first listing in the drop-down menu.

steps.headline: Find the expiration date next to "Expires."
steps.description: You should see this near the middle of the chart under "Starts."

steps.headline: Go to https://store.playstation.com/en-us/subscriptions in any web browser.
steps.description: You can use any web browser on your computer to check your account status.

steps.headline: Click Sign In to log in to your account.
steps.description: It's the link at the top-right corner of the page. Use your Sony Entertainment email address and password to sign in. If you don't remember your account info, click Trouble Signing In for help with resetting your password.

steps.headline: Find the expiration date next to your PlayStation Plus subscription.
steps.description: You'll see the subscription's expiration date listed in the detail box.

text: Using a PlayStation Console Turn on your PlayStation and connect to the internet. If your PlayStation is not already online, you'll need to connect to the internet now. You should see a network name that you're connected to when you navigate to your Settings > Network. Press ↑ on the controller. Make sure you're on the Home screen of your PlayStation so you'll access the function area. Select the golden cross icon that looks like controller buttons PlayStation Plus. You'll see this at the left of the menu. Select Manage Membership. You'll see this in the top right corner of your screen and a menu will drop-down. Select Subscription. This is usually the first listing in the drop-down menu. Find the expiration date next to "Expires." You should see this near the middle of the chart under "Starts." Using a Web Browser Go to https://store.playstation.com/en-us/subscriptions in any web browser. You can use any web browser on your computer to check your account status. Click Sign In to log in to your account. It's the link at the top-right corner of the page. Use your Sony Entertainment email address and password to sign in. If you don't remember your account info, click Trouble Signing In for help with resetting your password. Find the expiration date next to your PlayStation Plus subscription. You'll see the subscription's expiration date listed in the detail box.
